wisps.registry.db package¶

Submodules¶

wisps.registry.db.db module¶

wisps.registry.db.db.associate(names, values)¶

Given a list of names and their associated values, return a dictionary

wisps.registry.db.db.connect(db)¶

Returns sqlite3.Connection object for a given database housed in the db directory.

wisps.registry.db.db.create_new_metadata_db()¶

Deletes old metadata table and replaces it with a new table based on the configuration.

wisps.registry.db.db.create_new_properties_db()¶

Deletes old properties table and replaces it with a new table based on the configuration.

wisps.registry.db.db.create_variable_db()¶

Creates a variable database based off of dictionary

wisps.registry.db.db.dump_db()¶
wisps.registry.db.db.get_all_metadata(name)¶

Returns dictionary of attribute names and values that are defined (not None or an empty string) for given variable name. str name : name of the variable.

wisps.registry.db.db.get_all_variables(**kwargs)¶

Returns the value of of the attribute for the name. str name : name of predictor. e.g. wind_speed

wisps.registry.db.db.get_by_metadata(**kwargs)¶

Returns the value of of the attribute for the name. str name : name of predictor. e.g. wind_speed

wisps.registry.db.db.get_column_names_string(names)¶

returns a sqlite string for column names given a set of names. Assumes all columns are of type ‘text’

wisps.registry.db.db.get_data_type(name)¶

Check if data_type is defined in the properties database for this varibale name. Return value if available, otherwise throw ValueError.

wisps.registry.db.db.get_dictionary_attribute_keys(variables)¶

Gets all of the unique attribute names for each variable and returns an set of the results. Parsing the config is specific to the nc_vars yaml file.

wisps.registry.db.db.get_dictionary_properties_keys(variables)¶

Gets all of the unique properties names for each variable and returns an set of the results. Parsing the config is specific to the nc_vars yaml file.

wisps.registry.db.db.get_dimensions_type(name)¶

Check if dimensions is defined in the properties database for this varibale name. Return value if available, otherwise throw ValueError.

wisps.registry.db.db.get_metadata(name, attr)¶

Returns the value of of the attribute for the name. str name : name of predictor. e.g. wind_speed

wisps.registry.db.db.get_property(name, attr)¶

Returns the value of of the attribute for the name. str name : name of predictor. e.g. wind_speed

wisps.registry.db.db.get_variable(**kwargs)¶

Returns the value of of the attribute for the name. str name : name of predictor. e.g. wind_speed

wisps.registry.db.db.get_variable_fields()¶
wisps.registry.db.db.get_variable_types()¶
wisps.registry.db.db.insert_variable(property, source, start, end, duration, duration_method, vert_coord1, vert_coord2, vert_method, filename, name)¶

Inserts variable metadata information into the table. Requires arguments in the following order: property, source, start, end, duration, duration_method, vert_coord1, vert_coord2, vert_method, filename, name

wisps.registry.db.db.print_from(db, name)¶

Prints a formatted list of attribute names and their associated values for a given variable name.

wisps.registry.db.db.print_metadata(name)¶
wisps.registry.db.db.print_properties(name)¶
